notes:
Arthei was once a normal person and a citizen of [[Carlin]]. He, his wife [[Kala]], and his brothers [[Marziel]], [[Lersatio]], and [[Boreth]], travelled to [[Yalahar]] in order to find a new home. From that moment on Marziel started keeping a [[Arthei's Descent into Vampirism I (Book)|diary]].
This creature is the strongest of all vampire bosses and the fourth and last boss you will encounter during the [[Blood Brothers Quest]].
You will receive [[The Dust of Arthei]] when you use a [[Blessed Wooden Stake]] on his dead body.
